title: [Request] Minimize tabs on connect
author: Silent-Joker
body_snippet: Can there be an option to minimize tabs on connect.  I have connection tabs on left and popup.  When i connect to a connection it sits on the connections and i must move my mouse away from the tab.

comments.snippet:
To make sure that I understand: Connections tree is set to autohide, but even after opening a connection, the tree is still visible until you move your mouse away from it?

If I'm not understanding properly... Could you please clarify, possibly with screen shots?
comments.author: kmscode
